-Very outdated rooms with old furniture, broked floor tiles, stains everywhere (curtains, walls, table lamps) and very very musty and moldy bathrooms.

But at least we got less noise and a few proper nights of sleep. 
This hotel is fine if you are looking for a very basic place to store your luggage for a few nights. Not for 2,5 weeks.
It is definitely not a boutique hotel, where you not only expect a amall hotel on a prime location, but also unique personality and decor, personalized service, and a local flair. And a bit more luxury, like it appears on the ground floor (restaurant, shop and reception). 
I think the photos of the rooms on google/booking/social media etcetera are taken from tactical angles. 
This place in in desperate need of a renovation. I would go back for the location, but only if the place got an extensive upgrade and meets the 2023 standards of a 3 star hotel.
